TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase

summary.span: 表示用于显示命令按钮的特殊字段，这些按钮可在数据绑定控件中执行选择、编辑、插入或删除操作。

span.span: Represents a special field that displays command buttons to perform selecting, editing, inserting, or deleting operations in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是数据绑定控件使用的特殊字段， (例如 和 ) 显示执行删除、编辑、插入或选择操作的命令按钮。The class is a special field used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display command buttons that perform delete, edit, insert, or select operations. 可以使用下表中显示的属性来显示或隐藏执行这些操作的命令按钮。The command buttons to perform these operations can be shown or hidden using the properties shown in the following table. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏 数据绑定控件中每个记录的字段中的 "删除" 按钮。Shows or hides a Delete button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. "删除" 按钮允许用户从数据源中删除记录。The Delete button allows the user to delete a record from the data source.| ||显示或隐藏 数据绑定控件中每个记录的字段中的 "编辑" 按钮。Shows or hides an Edit button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 使用 "编辑" 按钮，用户可以编辑数据源中的记录。The Edit button allows the user to edit a record from the data source. 当用户单击特定记录的 "编辑" 按钮时，"编辑" 按钮将被 "更新" 按钮和 "取消" 按钮替换。When the user clicks the Edit button for a specific record, that Edit button is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 还将隐藏其他所有命令按钮。All other command buttons are also hidden.| ||显示或隐藏字段中的 "新建" 按钮 。Shows or hides the New button in a field. "新建" 按钮允许用户在数据源中插入新记录。The New button allows the user to insert a new record in the data source. 当用户单击 "新建" 按钮时，会将其替换为 "插入" 按钮和 "取消" 按钮。When the user clicks the New button, it is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button. 还将隐藏其他所有命令按钮。All other command buttons are also hidden. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作（如控件）的数据绑定控件 。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support inserting operations, such as the control.| ||显示或隐藏 数据绑定控件中每个记录的字段中的 "选择" 按钮。Shows or hides a Select button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 使用 "选择" 按钮，用户可以在数据绑定控件中选择一条记录。The Select button allows the user to select a record in the data-bound control.| 此外，可以通过设置属性来显示或隐藏记录处于编辑或插入模式时显示的 "取消" 按钮 。In addition, the Cancel button displayed when a record is in edit or insert mode can be shown or hidden by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 当数据绑定控件与数据源 (控件（如 控件) ）结合使用时，数据绑定控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动删除、更新和插入功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete, update, and insert functionality. 对于其他数据源，您需要提供例程以便在数据绑定控件的相应事件期间执行这些操作。For other data sources, you need to provide the routines to perform these operations during the appropriate events for the data-bound control. 此 字段的显示方式取决于使用它的数据绑定控件。The field is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如， 控件 以列的形式显示字段，而控件则将 其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a field as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要指定要显示的按钮类型，请使用 属性。To specify the type of button to display, use the property. 如果将 属性设置为 `ButtonType.Button` 或 `ButtonType.Link` ，则可以通过设置下表中显示的属性来指定要为按钮显示的文本。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, you can specify the text to display for the buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||"取消" 按钮的标题。The caption for the Cancel button.| ||"删除" 按钮的标题。The caption for the Delete button.| ||"编辑" 按钮的标题。The caption for the Edit button.| ||"插入" 按钮的标题。The caption for the Insert button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作（如控件）的数据绑定控件 。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||"新建" 按钮的标题。The caption for the New button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作（如控件）的数据绑定控件 。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||"选择" 按钮的标题。The caption for the Select button.| ||"更新" 按钮的标题。The caption for the Update button.| 您可以通过将 属性设置为 `ButtonType.Image` ，然后设置下表中显示的属性，而不是显示命令按钮或链接按钮。Instead of displaying a command button or a link button, you can display an image button by setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the properties shown in the following table. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为 "取消" 按钮显示的图像The image to display for the Cancel button| ||为 "删除" 按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the Delete button.| ||要为 "编辑" 按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the Edit button.| ||要为 "插入" 按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the Insert button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作（如控件）的数据绑定控件 。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||要为 "新建" 按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the New button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作（如控件）的数据绑定控件 。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||要为 "选择" 按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the Select button.| ||为 "更新" 按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the Update button.| 默认情况下，当用户单击字段中的按钮时 ，将对该页上的所有验证控件执行验证。By default, when the user clicks a button in a field, validation is performed on all validation controls on the page. 若要防止在单击按钮时进行验证，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To prevent validation from occurring when a button is clicked, set the property to `false`. 可以 通过将属性设置为来隐藏数据绑定控件中的字段 `false` 。You can hide a field in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 可以 通过字段自定义其页眉和页脚部分。The field allows you to customize its header and footer sections. 若要在页眉或页脚部分显示标题，请 分别设置或 属性。To display a caption in the header or the footer section, set the or the property, respectively. 您可以通过设置属性来显示图像，而不是在页眉节中显示文本 。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 若要隐藏对象中的标头部分 ，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To hide the header section in a object, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件 (例如 控件) 可以仅显示或隐藏控件的整个标题部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持 单个按钮字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual button field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标题节 (如有) ，请使用控件的 `ShowHeader` 属性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property. 还可以 通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性，自定义对象的外观 (字体颜色、背景色等) 。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||对象的子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置 。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||对象的脚注部分的样式设置 。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||对象的标头部分的样式设置 。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||对象中数据项的样式设置 。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 字段显示控件，以便在控件中编辑记录 。The following code example demonstrates how to use a field to display controls to edit a record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField2/CS/commandfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField2/VB/commandfield2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、 和 属性来自定义编辑控件的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and properties to customize the text for the editing controls. summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 当向动态创建的数据绑定控件添加字段时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要将字段动态添加 到数据绑定控件，请创建一个新的 对象，设置其属性，然后将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a field to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用 控件，请将 对象添加到 集合中。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可将字段动态添加到数据绑定控件，但强烈建议根据需要静态声明字段，然后将其显示或隐藏。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段可减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数将字段列动态添加 到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a field column to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCtor/CS/commandfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCtor/VB/commandfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 字段的属性 设置为时 `ButtonType.Image` ，使用 属性指定要为 "取消" 按钮显示的图像。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the property to specify the image to display for the Cancel button. 只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式，此图像可以是任意文件格式 ( .jpg、.gif、.bmp 等) 上。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 作为显示 "取消" 按钮的图像的替代方法，您可以通过先将 属性设置为 `ButtonType.Button` 或 `ButtonType.Link` ，然后设置属性来显示文本 。As an alternative to displaying an image for the Cancel button, you can display text by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件的字段中的 "取消" 按钮指定要显示的自定义图像 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display for a Cancel button in a field of a control. 必须将属性设置为 `ButtonType.Image` ，"取消" 按钮才能显示图像。The property must be set to `ButtonType.Image` for a Cancel button to display an image. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击字段中的按钮时是否执行验证 。Use the property to specify whether validation is performed when a button in a field is clicked. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则默认情况下将验证该页上的所有验证控件。When this property is set to `true`, by default all validation controls on the page are validated. 若要将验证仅限制为一组特定的验证控件，请创建一个验证组，然后将该 属性设置为验证组的名称。To limit validation to only a certain group of validation controls, create a validation group and then set the property to the validation group's name. 有关验证组的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on validation groups, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来防止在单击字段中的按钮时进行验证 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent validation from occurring when a button in a field is clicked. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定是否在对象中显示 "取消" 按钮 。Use the property to specify whether the Cancel button is displayed in a object. 如果数据绑定控件中的相应记录处于编辑或插入模式，则可以在字段中显示 "取消" 按钮。A Cancel button can be displayed in a field when the corresponding record in a data-bound control is in edit or insert mode. "取消" 按钮允许用户取消编辑或插入操作，并将记录返回到其正常显示模式。The Cancel button allows the user to cancel the edit or insert operation and returns the record to its normal display mode. 当 字段的属性 设置为或时 `ButtonType.Button` `ButtonType.Link` ，请使用 属性指定要为 "取消" 按钮显示的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a Cancel button. 或者，可以先将 属性设置为 `ButtonType.Image` ，然后设置属性来显示图像 。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性隐藏控件中的行处于编辑模式时所显示的 "取消" 按钮 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the Cancel button displayed when a row in a control is in edit mode. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否在 数据源控件中的每个记录的字段中显示 "删除" 按钮。Use the property to specify whether a Delete button is displayed in a field for each record in the data-source control. 通过 "删除" 按钮，您可以从数据源中删除记录。The Delete button allows you to remove a record from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 当数据绑定控件与数据源 (控件（如 控件) ）结合使用时，数据绑定控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动删除功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete functionality. 对于其他数据源，必须提供例程以便在数据绑定控件的相应事件期间执行删除操作。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the delete operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当 字段的属性 设置为或时 `ButtonType.Button` `ButtonType.Link` ，请使用 属性指定要为 "删除" 按钮显示的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a Delete button. 或者，可以先将 属性设置为 `ButtonType.Image` ，然后设置属性来显示图像 。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件中的每条记录显示 "删除" 按钮 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a Delete button for each record in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否在 数据源控件中的每个记录的字段中显示 "编辑" 按钮。Use the property to specify whether an Edit button is displayed in the field for each record in the data-source control. 使用 "编辑" 按钮可以编辑记录的值。The Edit button allows you to edit the values of a record. 当用户单击 "编辑" 按钮时，将为记录中的每个字段显示输入控件。When the user clicks an Edit button, input controls are displayed for each field in the record. 记录的 "编辑" 按钮被替换为 "更新" 按钮和 "取消" 按钮，记录的所有其他命令按钮都将隐藏。The Edit button for the record is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons for the record are hidden. 单击 "更新" 按钮将用数据源中的新值更新记录，而单击 "取消" 按钮将取消该操作。Clicking the Update button updates the record with the new values in the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation. > [!NOTE] > 在将数据绑定控件与数据源 (控件（如 控件) ）结合使用时，数据绑定控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动更新功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. 对于其他数据源，必须提供例程以便在数据绑定控件的相应事件中执行更新操作。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the update operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当 字段的属性 设置为或时 `ButtonType.Button` `ButtonType.Link` ，请使用 属性指定要为 "编辑" 按钮显示的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for an Edit button. 或者，可以先将 属性设置为 `ButtonType.Image` ，然后设置属性来显示图像 。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件中的每个记录显示一个 "编辑" 按钮 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an Edit button for each record in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否在字段中显示新按钮 。Use the property to specify whether a New button is displayed in a field. "新建" 按钮仅在字段中显示一次 ，并允许用户在数据源中添加新记录。The New button is displayed only once in the field and allows the user to add a new record in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作（如控件）的数据绑定控件 。This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control. 当用户单击 "新建" 按钮时，将为数据绑定控件中显示的每个字段显示输入控件，允许用户输入新记录的值。When the user clicks the New button, input controls are displayed for each field displayed in the data-bound control, allowing the user to enter the values for the new record. "新建" 按钮将替换为 "插入" 按钮和 "取消" 按钮，并且该字段中的所有其他命令按钮 都将隐藏。The New button is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons in the field are hidden. 单击 "插入" 按钮会将记录添加到数据源，而单击 "取消" 按钮将取消该操作。Clicking the Insert button adds the record to the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation. > [!NOTE] > 当数据绑定控件与数据源 (控件（如 控件) ）结合使用时，数据绑定控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动插入功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic insert functionality. 对于其他数据源，您必须提供例程以便在数据绑定控件的相应事件中执行插入操作。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the insert operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当 字段的属性 设置为或时 `ButtonType.Button` `ButtonType.Link` ，请使用 属性指定要为新按钮显示的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a New button. 或者，可以先将 属性设置为 `ButtonType.Image` ，然后设置属性来显示图像 。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在控件中显示一个新按钮，该按钮 允许用户向数据源添加新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a New button in a control, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source. summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定包含在对象中的控件是否 支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 显示 "选择" 按钮时，类不支持回调。The class does not support callbacks when the Select button is displayed. 此方法已实现，在 显示 "选择" 按钮时引发异常。This method has been implemented to throw a exception when the Select button is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: 在 对象中显示“选择”按钮。

span.span: The Select button is displayed in the object.

exception.span: 当显示“选择”按钮时， 类支持回调。

span.span: The class does support callbacks when the Select button is displayed.

para.span: 从类派生的类 可以重写此方法，以指示字段包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，请将此方法实现为空方法，该方法不会引发异常;否则，将引发异常，并提供有用的消息，说明不支持回调的原因。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
